dialogues.text: Seele, thank you so much! We've finalized the recipes for the drinks quickly!
Drop the compliments. I just couldn't stand it anymore.
It's a fragrant and sweet drink. Everyone will definitely love it... Huh, wait a minute!
What's wrong now?
I almost forgot. You don't have a sweet tooth.
Humph. You finally remembered!
Then... do you like ginger tea? I heard it tastes hot and spicy.
What kind of strange drink is that? No one would enjoy something like that!
Let me think... how about sprinkling chili powder in hot cocoa? Would that be okay?
... Forget it.
You were busy in the kitchen all by yourself yesterday, and it seems like you're still confused today. Let me take care of it.
Huh, Seele, can you cook too?
O-Of course, there are many things I can do!
What do you plan to make? I'm really looking forward to it!
Haha, of course they're all Seele's favorite drinks!
That's great, Seele! After you finish, let me taste them too. I'm really excited to add your drinks to the menu!
Why would you want to taste something I made out of the blue?
Because you gave me very helpful suggestions yesterday!
... Well, since that's the case, I'll make it slightly more to your taste.
Great! While you're cooking, I'll decorate the room~
... You really can't stay idle. Fine, it's up to you.
